name: O'MALLEY
description: The O'Malley is not a conductor of festival pieces.

traits.name: Industrial Materials
traits.description: The O'Malley rolls an extra d6 on structure checks and drops the lowest die before determining the result.

synergies.detail: The O'Malley rolls an extra d6 on structure checks and drops the lowest die before determining the result.

traits.name: Volume of Fire
traits.description: When the O'Malley consumes Lock On as part of an attack, it can gain +1 Accuracy versus another target within 3 spaces of the original on an attack role made during the same attack action.

traits.name: Exposed Reactor
traits.description: The O'Malley takes +1 Difficulty on all ENGINEERING saves and checks.

synergies.detail: The O'Malley takes +1 Difficulty on all engineering saves and checks

core_system.active_effect: Your damaging weapons and systems deal +1 damage for each instance of damage you or your systems have previously scored this round, to a maximum of +2.
core_system.passive_effect: For the rest of the scene, your maximum bonus damage from lead symphony increases to +6. However, if your Lead Symphony would increase past +6, it resets to 0 instead, and ??? happens.
